item.title: Enable DoH when Chrome is managed
item.description: It happened to me to buy a new laptop. This laptop comes with all the usual OEM stuff to manage security and updates. One of those software scans every downloaded file and marks its origin. To do that the software enables the GroupPolicyUsers and installs an extension. Ok, cool but now whenever I want to change some Chrome (or even Firefox) settings I’m greeted with this message: Since I wanted to use my NextDNS account I had to fix this.
